event.comment: undetected erroneous data of the GPS
loss of availability of the GPS
undetected erroneous data of the IMU
loss of availability of the IMU
undetected erroneous data of the PositionEstimator
loss of availability of the PositionEstimator

vdm_lustre:guarantee.vdm_lustre:name: Output: cur_pos | Current location is computed from Estimated Position

event.comment: undetected erroneous data of the Navigator
loss of availability of the Navigator
undetected erroneous data of the FlightControl
loss of availability of the FlightControl
undetected erroneous data of the Actuation
loss of availability of the Actuation

vdm_lustre:guarantee.vdm_lustre:name: Output: nav_cmd | it sends signal to navigation only if it's in flying modes'

event.comment: undetected erroneous data of the DeliveryPlanner
loss of availability of the DeliveryPlanner

vdm_lustre:guarantee.vdm_lustre:name: Radio receives data from remote communication channel if there is a request
Without a request, no radio data is available

event.comment: undetected erroneous data of the Radio
loss of availability of the Radio

vdm_lustre:guarantee.vdm_lustre:name: if no op or abort command have received then delivery status gets re-started
If delivery command is issued, delivery status is different from NOT_STARTED

event.comment: undetected erroneous data of the DeliveryItemMechanism
loss of availability of the DeliveryItemMechanism
undetected erroneous data of the Camera
loss of availability of the Camera
undetected erroneous data of the connector
loss of availability of the connector

vdm_lustre:guarantee.vdm_lustre:name: P1: Constellation for GPS is initialized properly
P2: Launch location for IMU is initialized properly
P3: Delivery location for navigation is initialized properly
P4: A command to release a valuable package is issued only if drone has received confirmation from base
P5: The drone will always request a confirmation to base before starting delivery of a valuable package
P6: The drone is flying only if since last initialization the mission was not aborted

safetyReq.description: Delivery Item Mechanism is reliable, where an undetected erroneous command shall be less than 1e-7 pfh
Loss of actuation shall be less than 1e-7 pfh

cyberReq.description: The drone shall be resilient to maliciously commanded improper delivery of a package
The drone shall be resilient to loss of ability to deliver a package to the appropriate consumer location

mission.description: Deliver a package to the intended location.
